answerText: stellar wind or solar wind[10] These massive stars have a characteristically gigantic amount of stellar wind, up to 10 to the negative 5th solar masses per year. Gamma-2 Velorum is the prototypical one.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Penn | 19 | Science | Other | College
subject: Science
question: Question: The mass loss due to this phenomenon can change the fate of an intermediate mass star from a supernova to a white dwarf. For 10 points each: [10] Name this phenomenon in which a star ejects charged gases due to a magnetic field. The version that the sun emits forms the heliosphere.
